Bash(D:okxstock_agent.venvScriptspython.exe -c "
import psycopg2
try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect\(
        host=''postgresql.zeabur.app'',
        port=5432,
        user=''root'',
        password=''4fIu8g6csU3FVZDO9bWP7AM1rGvBT520'',
        database=''zeabur'',
        connect_timeout=15
    \)
    cur = conn.cursor\(\)
    cur.execute\(''SELECT version\(\)''\)
    version = cur.fetchone\(\)[0]
    print\(''Connection SUCCESS!''\)
    print\(''PostgreSQL version:'', version\)
    cur.close\(\)
    conn.close\(\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(''Connection FAILED:'', str\(e\)\)
")
